channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Project 1: Poker with Python
item.description: Welcome to my first blog post! Using Python, I have attempted to create a simplified game of poker. In this simple version of poker, each player is dealt 5 cards. The player with the highest card wins. I will go on to explain what I have done in my script, which is attached below, and improvements and additions I would make moving forward. I began by defining a function for my game so that it could be run by calling poker_game().
